docs.title: Welcome to my documentation
docs.text: You will find some kind stuff here.

docs.title: My infrastructure
docs.text: This the detail of my home infrastrucutre.

docs.title: My media server
docs.text: I have setup a media server to watch some contents at home. Also available from external network trough a VPN.

docs.title: Hardware
docs.text:
My media server run on a NiPoGi AK2 PLUS Mini PC with following specifications :

Processor   :   Intel Alder Lake-N100 
RAM         :   16GB DDR4
Storage     :   512GB M.2 SSD

I also use a Raspberry Pi 3 B+ who host the VPN and a DNS server.

docs.title: Software
docs.text: I use different application to run my media server. All these applications run trough Docker container.

docs.title: tranmission-openvpn
docs.text:
I use Transmission-OpenVPN to download my favorite Linux ISO trough torrent.

This Docker container running Transmission torrent client with WebUI over an OpenVPN tunnel. I use a VPN to avoid exposing my public IP on Internet, I use PIA as VPN provider.

docs.title: Jellyfin
docs.text: Jellyfin is a Free Software Media System that permit you to read your different media. I use it trough a Docker container made by LinuxServer.io.
